name: lifepilot
description: A comprehensive full-stack AI assistant application

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:frontend && npm run install:backend && npm run install:ai
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:ai"
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend && npm run build:ai
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend && npm run test:ai
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:ai
scripts.deploy:dev: cd infrastructure && terraform workspace select dev && terraform apply
scripts.deploy:staging: cd infrastructure && terraform workspace select staging && terraform apply
scripts.deploy:prod: cd infrastructure && terraform workspace select prod && terraform apply
